formattedAddress: 125 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 125 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Really friendly staff. Came in with my Red Wing Iron Rangers that somehow were torn on the side of one boot. Brought them in and they walked me through what they can do for them. They said it wouldn’t be perfect but that didn’t matter to me. Took three weeks and honestly they did a great job. Couldn’t even tell which one was torn before at first glance. With further inspection, you can tell where they did the repair. They polished the boots as well. Love these boots and didn’t want to toss them so happy to have these repaired as Red Wing couldn’t repair them. Would recommend this place to anyone who needs their shoes repaired or polished.

originalText.text: Can not speak highly enough about these guys! I had a bad experience with a pair of shoes getting lost during repairs with the official Louboutins store in paris so I’ve been waiting for years to find a place I trusted to have my favorite shoes fixed (they started stacking up!!). When I found Vince’s Cobbler I decided to give it a go. I brought 1 pair in to try it out. And when they came back timely and flawless I brought in 6 more. I walk hard and am always in heels for hours and hours so they needed a little extra care to make them stronger. It was discussed, appropriate recommendations were made for my particular wear and the repairs were performed exquisitely. Was it pricey ? Yeah, a little. But it was 100% worth it.

originalText.text: The team at Vince's did an excellent job with the two vintage bags I brought them. They're very up front about what can and can't be done, which helps manage your expectations. They replaced a crumbling liner in my vintage Gucci bag and even Facetimed me from the shop to show me color options! The bag looks great and the price was fair considering they had to completely deconstruct the bag.

originalText.text: I brought in a pair of white leather boots and asked to paint them black and they did a fantastic job! Came in ahead of schedule, and the email / text confirmations provided for a seamless customer experience. Would highly recommend!

text.text: I brought in a pair of white leather boots and asked to paint them black and they did a fantastic job! Came in ahead of schedule, and the email / text confirmations provided for a seamless customer experience. Would highly recommend!

originalText.text: I had an old Chanel purse with a worn out woven strap. They were able to replace the fabric portion and keep the original hardware. It took a few weeks but they did a great job. They are sometimes quite busy but I think it speaks to the loyalty and trust their customers have for them.
